contest-event.event-date:
June 2, 1894 D Haydon Bridge Contest
Haydon Bridge Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
haydon-bridge-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Haydon Bridge, Northumberland, England, UK Prizes: £15, £10, £7, £3. Brass Band News(July 1894) gives 3rd place result as Ashington Colliery, but article from correspondent states it was Ashington Model. 5 bands competed
April 8, 2012, 9:57 p.m. Nov. 26, 2019, 12:37 p.m.
1 South Derwent John Gladney Jnr
2 West Hartlepool Old William Holdsworth
3 Ashington Model George F. Birkinshaw
4 Carlisle Artillery Walter Atkinson
5 South Shields Harmonic Joseph Greenwood
Withdrawn Backworth Colliery Band Unknown
Withdrawn Tanfield Lea Unknown
Withdrawn Walbottle Temperance Unknown
